    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - libstdcxx-ng >=12
    - root_base >=6.26.8,<6.26.9.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/gds/dttview/TLGMath.hh
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libRdttview${SHLIB_EXT}
    - root -b -l -x -q -e "gInterpreter->AddIncludePath(\"${PREFIX}/include/gds\");
      gSystem->Load(\"libRdttview\");"
    - root -b -l -x -q -e "gInterpreter->AddIncludePath(\"${PREFIX}/include/gds\");
      gSystem->Load(\"libRgdsplot\");"
    - root -b -l -x -q -e "gInterpreter->AddIncludePath(\"${PREFIX}/include/gds\");
      gSystem->Load(\"libRligogui\");"
    - pkg-config --print-errors --exact-version 2.19.7 gdsdttview
    - pkg-config --print-errors --exact-version 2.19.7 gdsligogui
  requires:
    - pkg-config
about:
  description: GDS control room tools and GUI libraries
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/gds/gds.git
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/DMT
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: GDS control room tools
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - emaros
